price: 138. Ugu bishaaree munaafiqiinta inay leeyihiin cadaab xanuun badan.
arabic: بَشِّرِ ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقِينَ بِأَنَّ لَهُمۡ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: bashiri al-munāfiqīna bi-anna lahum ʿadhāban alīman
